text:
Has anyone had success implementing rate limits to workflow actions? ðŸ«·:stopwatch:
The documentation says a "429 Too many requests" response will respect the Retry-After header but It does not seem to work.
Retries are happening in the same frequency as a 500 error, not leaving enough time for rate limit to recover.
I also can't see the response body in the action logs but I know it is sent.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions#execution>
